title: Dear Riot: Please do me this one last favor
body:
I'm quitting League Of Legends, however I request of something. I have spent and been gifted **A LOT** of money on this account. Since I am rarely using this account anymore, I really would love to transfer my champions and skins to my friend. I would be horribly sad knowing that LOTS of money and time I've spent on this game would to be to waste. So is there a way I can transfer it? _Maybe confiscate or take away my champions and skins on this account and then have it gifted to my friends account?_ 

Friends Summoner Name: **Orack1**

I understand if you can't do it due to Code of Conduct and such, but please, I beg of you to do me this one last favor, in repay for all the time and money I've put in this game.

Thanks - TheRealStavros

Have a good day

replies.body: I would be hugely gratefull if I could get an answer.

Unfortunately, this is something we cannot do. Content is tied to an account, as well as all purchases, as stated in our [Terms of Use.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse#user-content)

Let me know if you have any questions. Best of luck in your future gaming endeavors~
I really wouldn't want all of it to go to waste. Wayyy too much time and money was put on this account. I would want it to somehow be put to use.
Is there at least anyway these ALL my skins and champions won't go to waste?
